text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @PressSec If only Trump had nominated a qualified person to head the SBA instead of a big donor! The funds have been misused. Democrats and @SpeakerPelosi want better oversight before allocating more funds. @FoxNews @CNN @MSNBC https://t.co/KTeiORNtnG
